title: Pitt to honor College Football Hall of Famer Ruben Brown at Thursday's game
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Sports - Today 
The University of Pittsburgh will honor 2015 College Football Hall of Fame inductee Ruben Brown at halftime of Thursday night's game against...
